import { AlertDialog, AlertDialogBody, AlertDialogContent, AlertDialogFooter, AlertDialogHeader, AlertDialogOverlay, Box, Button, Center, Table, TableCaption, TableContainer, Tbody, Td, Tfoot, Th, Thead, Tr, useDisclosure } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import { useContext,useRef } from "react"; import { checkout } from "../Context/CartContext/action"; import { CartContext } from "../Context/CartContext/CartContextProvider"; const Cart = () => { const {state,dispatch}=useContext(CartContext); const {isOpen,onClose}=useDisclosure(); const cancelRef=useRef(); const handleCheckout=()=>{ dispatch(checkout()); onClose(); } return ( No Exchange | No Refund {state.map((cartItem)=>( ))}
Product Price (INR) Remove From Cart
{cartItem.title} {cartItem.price}
Final Price {Math.round(state.reduce((a,c)=>a+c.price,0))}
Place Order Are you sure you want to place this order ?
); }; export default Cart;
